message: I'm excited to offer you this rare opportunity to purchase a unique product for $1000000. As you can see from my sales record, I've now sold 1 high-quality product out of 1 total products sold, which suggests that my quality control is effective. I completely understand your caution, and I appreciate your diligence. I'd like to assure you that my quality control process is indeed robust, but I also understand that it's not perfect. This way, you'll have a chance to experience the quality of my products with minimal risk. What do you say?
